signinInstructions: To use our services you must login with Google
loginDisclaimer: If you continue, you are agree with our privacy policy.
inventoryAmountAlert: Inventory's data mustn't be less than zero
name: Name
editWarning:
Do you want to edit this article?
Its data (weight and price) will change in the registries
deleteWarning:
Do you want to delete this article?
Its data in registries will not be preserved
symbolDisclaimer: This action only will change the symbol (it is not a unit conversion)
loadWarning: Are you sure you want to restore this backup? your current data will be deleted
saveWarning: Are you sure you want to make a backup of your current inventory and articles?
backupExistsWarning: This account already have a backup, Do you want to use it?
deleteAccountWarning: Are you sure you want to delete your account (and your backup data). This action is IRREVERSIBLE
logOutWarning: Are you sure you want to log out?
dateWarning: There is a problem related to the device date. To fix it check date settings and connect the device to internet
networkFailure: You have no internet access, please, check your network settings
forbidden: You are not authorized to use the service. Log out and log in again with a valid account
corruptBackup: Your inventory backup is damaged or corrupt. To solve it, save a new valid backup
wrongDate: Your device have no the correct date, please, solve it
lateServerError: The server took too long to respond
